name: Brony Wristband Bundle!
description:
You a fan of My Little Pony? Are you a Brony? You like wristbands? Can't pick which is your favorite? Why not have all of them!?

You can order the full Mane 6 plus Black and Derpy wristbands in one complete bundle!

You get this at the discounted rate of $25 and shipping!

If you order the bundle I will also toss in a random MLP official mini pony figure with your order and a two free stickers.  It will be a completely random pony! Who will you get?

This makes a perfect gift for Brony or if you and a few friends want to share.

name: Brony Wristbands (Mane 6 Colors plus Black and Derpy!)
description:
Unleash you inner Pony Swag with the one and only...Brony Wristband!

You got the My Little Pony T-Shirt, book-bag, socks...You are a full Brony now but...what else do you need to show off your inner Brony?

Brony Wristband! 

Please Note: You only get one wristband

We now have the Mane 6 colors plus Black and Derpy! 

All you need to do is just order the wristband and add a note saying which one you want. 

If you don't care about colors than just say random or put nothing in the notes. 


Colors are:

Pink [Pink]
Purple [Twilight]
White [Rarity with Purple Font]
Orange [Applejack]
Blue [Rainbow Dash]
Black [Original]
Grey [Derpy]
Yellow [Fluttershy with Pink Font]

name: Twilightlicious Wristband! [Sold Out!]
description: I'm the T to the WI, LIGHT, and ain't no other pony troll it down like me, I'm TWILIGHTLICOUS - Tara Strong as Twilight Sparkle Show your Twilightlicousness(?) by wearing the new wristband! A link to Twilightlicous video made by BlackGryph0n and voiced by Tara Strong http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wblE8YYLyQ0 If you want a Twilight Wristband! Order the Purple Wristband. I am currently out of stock. Please Note: You only get one wristband (Unless you order more then one) You can contact me at my email or follow the blog Broniesunited.tumblr.com Levelboy14@gmail.com
